Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show how people communicate over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can draw the device, ensuring that it uses sound to communicate.
The student can illustrate both students using the string telephone to send or receive information.
The student can represent the connection between the two phones as a string that allows for sound to travel.
The student can label or describe the function of each part of the string telephone in their drawing.
